scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../worker && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.worker: cd worker && python -m celery -A tasks worker --loglevel=info --pool=solo
scripts.start: concurrently -n "API,UI,AI-WORKER" -c "blue,magenta,yellow" "npm run backend" "npm run client" "npm run worker"
